verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> unto the Lord <WH3068>; call <WH7121> upon his name <WH8034>: make known <WH3045> his deeds <WH5949> among the people <WH5971>.
Sing <WH7891> unto him <WH2167>, sing psalms unto him <WH7878>: talk you of all his wondrous works <WH6381>.
Glory <WH1984> you in his holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>: let the heart <WH3820> of them rejoice <WH8055> that seek <WH1245> the Lord <WH3068>.
Seek <WH1875> the Lord <WH3068>, and his strength <WH5797>: seek <WH1245> his face <WH6440> evermore <WH8548>.
Remember <WH2142> his marvelous works <WH6381> that he has done <WH6213>; his wonders <WH4159>, and the judgments <WH4941> of his mouth <WH6310>;
O you seed <WH2233> of Abraham <WH85> his servant <WH5650>, you sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> his chosen <WH972>.
He is the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>: his judgments <WH4941> are in all the earth <WH776>.
He has remembered <WH2142> his covenant <WH1285> for ever <WH5769>, the word <WH1697> which he commanded <WH6680> to a thousand <WH505> generations <WH1755>.
Which covenant he made <WH3772> with Abraham <WH85>, and his oath <WH7621> unto Isaac <WH3446>;
And confirmed <WH5975> the same unto Jacob <WH3290> for a law <WH2706>, and to Israel <WH3478> for a everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>:
Saying <WH559>, Unto you will I give <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, the lot <WH2256> of your inheritance <WH5159>:
When they were but a few men <WH4962> in number <WH4557>; Yes <WH4592>, very few, and strangers in it <WH1481>.
When they went <WH1980> from one nation <WH1471> to another <WH4467>, from one kingdom to another <WH312> people <WH5971>;
He allowed <WH3240> no man <WH120> to do them wrong <WH6231>: Yes <WH3198>, he reproved kings for their sakes <WH4428>;
Saying <WH5060>, Touch not my anointed <WH4899>, and do my prophets <WH5030> no harm <WH7489>.
Moreover he called <WH7121> for a famine <WH7458> upon the land <WH776>: he broke <WH7665> the whole staff <WH4294> of bread <WH3899>.
He sent <WH7971> a man <WH376> before <WH6440> them <WH3130>, even Joseph, who was sold <WH4376> for a servant <WH5650>:
Whose feet <WH7272> they hurt <WH6031> with fetters <WH3525>: he <WH5315> was laid <WH935> in iron <WH1270>:
Until the time <WH6256> that his word <WH1697> came <WH935>: the word <WH565> of the Lord <WH3068> tried him <WH6884>.
The king <WH4428> sent <WH7971> and loosened <WH5425> him <WH4910>; even the ruler of the people <WH5971>, and let him go free <WH6605>.
He made <WH7760> him lord <WH113> of his house <WH1004>, and ruler <WH4910> of all his substance <WH7075>:
To bind <WH631> his princes <WH8269> at his pleasure <WH5315>; and teach his senators <WH2205> wisdom <WH2449>.
Israel <WH3478> also came <WH935> into Egypt <WH4714>; and Jacob <WH3290> stayed <WH1481> in the land <WH776> of Ham <WH2526>.
And he increased <WH6509> his people <WH5971> greatly <WH3966>; and made them stronger <WH6105> than their enemies <WH6862>.
He turned <WH2015> their heart <WH3820> to hate <WH8130> his people <WH5971>, to deal subtly <WH5230> with his servants <WH5650>.
He sent <WH7971> Moses <WH4872> his servant <WH5650>; and Aaron <WH175> whom he had chosen <WH977>.
They showed <WH7760> his signs <WH226> among them <WH4159>, and wonders in the land <WH776> of Ham <WH2526>.
He sent <WH7971> darkness <WH2822>, and made it dark <WH2821>; and they rebelled <WH4784> not against his word <WH1697>.
He turned <WH2015> their waters <WH4325> into blood <WH1818>, and killed <WH4191> their fish <WH1710>.
Their land <WH776> brought forth <WH8317> frogs <WH6854> in abundance <WH8317>, in the chambers <WH2315> of their kings <WH4428>.
He spoke <WH559>, and there came <WH935> various sorts of flies <WH6157>, and lice <WH3654> in all their coasts <WH1366>.
He gave <WH5414> them hail <WH1259> for rain <WH1653>, and flaming <WH3852> fire <WH784> in their land <WH776>.
He struck <WH5221> their vines <WH1612> also and their fig trees <WH8384>; and broke <WH7665> the trees <WH6086> of their coasts <WH1366>.
He spoke <WH559>, and the locusts <WH697> came <WH935>, and caterpillers <WH3218>, and that without number <WH4557>,
And did eat up <WH398> all the herbs <WH6212> in their land <WH776>, and devoured <WH398> the fruit <WH6529> of their ground <WH127>.
He struck <WH5221> also all the firstborn <WH1060> in their land <WH776>, the chief <WH7225> of all their strength <WH202>.
He brought them forth <WH3318> also with silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>: and there was not one feeble <WH3782> person among their tribes <WH7626>.
Egypt <WH4714> was glad <WH8055> when they departed <WH3318>: for the fear <WH6343> of them fell upon them <WH5307>.
He spread <WH6566> a cloud <WH6051> for a covering <WH4539>; and fire <WH784> to give light <WH215> in the night <WH3915>.
The people asked <WH7592>, and he brought <WH935> quails <WH7958>, and satisfied <WH7646> them with the bread <WH3899> of heaven <WH8064>.
He opened <WH6605> the rock <WH6697>, and the waters <WH4325> gushed out <WH2100>; they ran <WH1980> in the dry places <WH6723> like a river <WH5104>.
For he remembered <WH2142> his holy <WH6944> promise <WH1697>, and Abraham <WH85> his servant <WH5650>.
And he brought forth <WH3318> his people <WH5971> with joy <WH8342>, and his chosen <WH972> with gladness <WH7440>:
And gave <WH5414> them the lands <WH776> of the heathen <WH1471>: and they inherited <WH3423> the labor <WH5999> of the people <WH3816>;
That they might observe <WH8104> his statutes <WH2706>, and keep <WH5341> his laws <WH8451>. Praise <WH1984> you the Lord <WH3050>.
